snippet: State Senator Adriano Espaillat, running in the Democratic primary for Representative Charles B. Rangel’s seat, now has the support of a prominent Latino leader, Fernando Ferrer.
abstract: Fernando Ferrer, former Bronx borough president and prominent Hispanic leader, endorses State Senator Adriano Espaillat in his bid for Rep Charles B Rangel’s Congressional seat.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Adriano Espaillat, running in the Democratic primary for Representative Charles B. Rangel’s seat, now has the support of a prominent Latino leader, Fernando Ferrer.

headline.seo: Senator Adriano Espaillat Is Endorsed by Ferrer in House Race
headline.main: Challenger to Rangel Lands a Prominent Endorsement
headline.print_headline: A Prominent Endorsement For a Challenger to Rangel
